hero.name: Jaehyeon (AJ) Ahn
hero.title: UW Computer Science Student specializing in Data Science
hero.description: Building ML solutions and database systems • CrossFit Coach passionate about data-driven training

about: I'm an undergraduate at the Paul G. Allen School of Computer Science at the University of Washington, pursuing the Data Science option. I'm passionate about solving complex problems with data, building machine learning solutions, and developing robust database systems. When I'm not coding, I coach CrossFit and love analyzing training data to optimize athletic performance.

currentStudies.title: Natural Language Processing
currentStudies.description: Building and training language models, exploring transformer architectures, and implementing NLP algorithms for text analysis and generation.

currentStudies.title: Machine Learning & Deep Learning
currentStudies.description: Implementing ML algorithms from scratch, exploring deep learning architectures, and applying statistical learning theory to real-world problems.

currentStudies.title: Database Systems
currentStudies.description: Developing a simple database from scratch, implementing query optimization algorithms, and exploring distributed database architectures.

currentStudies.title: Software Engineering
currentStudies.description: Creating full-stack web applications with focus on software design patterns, testing methodologies, and scalable architecture.

projects.title: Wizardry GPT
projects.description: A specialized language model fine-tuned for generating creative fantasy content, implementing transformer architecture with custom training pipeline.

projects.title: LipNet with Self-Attention
projects.description: Enhanced lip reading model incorporating self-attention mechanisms for improved accuracy in visual speech recognition tasks.

projects.title: Simple DB
projects.description: A from-scratch implementation of a relational database system with B+ tree indexing, query optimization, and transaction management.

projects.title: Mapping Anxiety
projects.description: Interactive data visualization platform analyzing anxiety patterns across demographics using D3.js and modern web technologies.

projects.title: Self-Driving Car
projects.description: Computer vision-based autonomous vehicle system using convolutional neural networks for lane detection and path planning.

projects.title: Flight Manager
projects.description: Comprehensive flight booking system with complex SQL queries, database normalization, and real-time seat availability tracking.

education.title: University of Washington
education.description: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science with Data Science option. Relevant coursework: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing, Database Systems, Software Engineering, Data Structures & Algorithms.

education.title: CrossFit Coach @ Persistence Athletics
education.description: Lead group fitness classes for 15-20 athletes, design personalized training programs, track performance metrics, and analyze training data to optimize athlete progress and reduce injury risk.

education.title: Bellevue College
education.description: Completed foundational computer science courses including Data Structures (CS 210), Computer Programming (CS 211), and Calculus III (MATH 208) with honors.
